Constructor & Destructor Documentation

cma::SegTagger::SegTagger ( const string &  cateName,
VTrie *  posTrie,
double  eScore = 0.7 
)

Create the SegTagger

Parameters:
cateName the poc category name, the model file(cateName + ".model") should exists.
posTrie the VTrie to hold the POS Information
eScore is a double value between 0.5 and 1.0, if the POC tag B has possiblity more the eScore, it will be tagged with E. EScore's default value is 0.7.

References initialize(), and setEScore().

Member Function Documentation

double cma::SegTagger::getEScore (  )  [inline]

Get the EScore
EScore is a double value between 0.5 and 1.0, if the POC tag B has possiblity more the eScore, it will be tagged with E.
EScore's default value is 0.7.

the EScore

EScore is a double value between 0.5 and 1.0, if the POC tag B has possiblity more the eScore, it will be tagged with E.
